data.title: Christian Berkel posted on LinkedIn
data.meta_description: Christian Berkel posted images on LinkedIn
data.text:
Alex Vale is hiring for the newly created position of Product Manager - Cold Chain Packaging at World Courier. Fantastic opportunity for a candidate with best in class knowledge of cold chain packaging solutions - you will be responsible for managing the entire lifecycle of these solutions at World Courier, in partnership with our vendors, customers and internal teams. This position is available on a hybrid basis either in Europe or East Coast US (timezones UTC -5 to UTC +2). See below advert for further details and reach out to me to discuss! Europe: https://lnkd.in/etwHhpXw East Coast US: https://lnkd.in/e4mxsjwt

I'm thrilled to announce that we're expanding our team in Lithuania with four new roles! Cold Chain Packaging at World Courier plays a pivotal role in transporting temperature-sensitive critical medicine worldwide, contributing to #healthierfutures. As we embrace digital transformation, we recognize the rich pool of talent in Vilnius, where professionals possess the exact skill sets we need to elevate our efficiency, precision, and success. If you're passionate about making a difference, we'd love for you to join us! Data Analyst, Packaging Fleet Management: https://lnkd.in/erQ9-P4b Supervisor, Inventory Management System: https://lnkd.in/e3akgp7n System Supervisor - Digital Control Tower: https://lnkd.in/ewzg5yRC System Analyst, Digital Control Tower: https://lnkd.in/eWNEYfP4

In January 2023, AmerisourceBergen proudly announced its intent to change its name to Cencora to reflect a bold vision and purpose-driven approach to creating healthier futures. This new chapter in our enduring story will fuel our global growth strategy, advance our impact in healthcare, and unify our presence around the world. http://ow.ly/sAPQ50MyJyo

Christopher Engel B.A., M.Sc. is hiring for the position of Director - Financial Services. Exciting opportunity to build a key service line for World Courier. This position can be based across locations with a World Courier presence in Europe or East Coast US. Adverts linked below, reach out to me to discuss in further detail! Francis X. Smith Paula Pulsoni Europe - https://lnkd.in/eAdP7udx US East Coast - https://lnkd.in/ejwbzfm3
